news.title: 'We're all kind of in shock.' Oracle's revenue projections leave analysts slack-jawed
news.summary: Oracle's earnings report included numbers that suggest the company's growth rate due to artificial intelligence is about to pop. Oracle's quarterly results were released on Wednesday.

news.title: Wholesale prices unexpectedly declined 0.1% in August, as Fed rate decision looms
news.summary: The producer price index was expected to increase 0.3% in August, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate. The consumer price index is expected to rise 0.4%.

news.title: Trump blocked from firing Fed Governor Lisa Cook as lawsuit plays out
news.summary: The Supreme Court is likely to have the final say on whether President Donald Trump has legal cause to remove Lisa Cook from the Federal Reserve.

news.title: Uber partners with fintech firm Pipe to offer loans to small businesses
news.summary: Uber is partnering with fintech firm Pipe to incorporate embedded technology in the Uber Eats Manager for small businesses to access loans. Uber is working with Pipe on the technology.

news.title: Trump presses European Union to impose 100% tariffs on India and China to pressure Putin
news.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump has asked the European Union to hit China and India with tariffs of up to 100% over the countries' Russia oil purchases.

news.title: Chewy’s stock drops, as Wall Street may have gotten too excited ahead of earnings
news.summary: Shares of Chewy stumbled in early trading Wednesday. The online seller of pet products reported fiscal second-quarter earnings that matched analysts’ projections but that weren’t good enough.

news.title: Emma Heming Willis on moving husband Bruce Willis into a second home for dementia care: ‘I know it raises eyebrows [but] you have to do what’s right’
news.summary: The Unexpected Journey was published by Simon & Schuster. The author talked about the book at a book launch event with Anderson Cooper. The book is about a woman's journey through life.

news.title: Beyond the Fed and AI: This five-star manager picks small-cap stock that can become giants
news.summary: The time could be ripe for smaller companies to get eaten by bigger ones. It's one reason to give the space a second look, says this five-star portfolio manager.

news.title: Tesla’s Elon Musk still leads the billionaires, but Oracle’s Larry Ellison is quickly gaining
news.summary: Larry Ellison’s net worth has jumped $103 billion since January. Ellison is now worth more than $100 billion, according to a new report.

news.title: ‘Fun came before paying bills’: My brother-in-law is in his 70s and homeless. Are we responsible for him?
news.summary: “At one point, he was even taking items from friend’s homes when they let him stay with them,” she says.
